data.name: Pieces of my Heart Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Pieces of my Heart's original soundtrack is 5 lo-fi, chilled songs to puzzle and bang to! Handcrafted to create a feeling of relaxation and calm as you puzzle your way into the hearts of beautiful women!

content_descriptors.notes:
Pieces of my Heart will have animated 2d sex scenes. This includes a small amount of interactivity with the 2d model (grabbing and moving), female voice acting, moaning, orgasm sounds, and sex sound effects.

The player chooses the girl he wishes to go on a "tinder-like" date with and they will engage in intercourse after a series of puzzles are completed.
